page.title: 15A Day in My Life
page.content: This is a usual Saturday in May for me. I usually get up at 8.30. I would get up later but I have football, it starts at 9.30 and finishes at 10.30. When I get back I watch t.v. At 11.30 I go for my music lesson. I arrive home at 1.00. I can then do what I want in the afternoon. Normally, I go out with my friends after dinner. There is not a great deal that we can do but we usually manage to amuse ourselves somehow. In the evening I watch t.v. There are mainly comedy programmes, quiz programmes and light entertainment on a typical Saturday. At 10.00 Match of the Day is on. This is a football programme showing the best of the day's matches. This finishes at 11.00. Lots of people watch this. I get to bed at 11.30.
